price: 7. Qu’(Allah) envoya contre eux durant sept nuits et huit jours consécutifs ; on voyait alors les gens étendus inertes, tels des troncs creux de palmiers.
arabic: سَخَّرَهَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ سَبۡعَ لَيَالٖ وَثَمَٰنِيَةَ أَيَّامٍ حُسُومٗاۖ فَتَرَى ٱلۡقَوۡمَ فِيهَا صَرۡعَىٰ كَأَنَّهُمۡ أَعۡجَازُ نَخۡلٍ خَاوِيَةٖ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: sakharahā ʿalayhim sabʿa layālin wathamāniyata ayyāmin ḥusūman fatarā al-qawma fīhā ṣarʿā ka-annahum aʿjāzu nakhlin khāwiyatin
